data.name: Sentry City Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The Music in Sentry city varies from dark synth-wave, 16bit, to upbeat electronic. It generally has a bass-heavy, dark electronic style to it. I took a lot of time creating the sounds, rhythms, and melodies for this soundtrack. It would be suitable for many occasions: from driving in the car, working out, to relaxing at home.
